== About Me ==

I’m Arun, a Computer Engineering student in Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. I’m a Free Software enthusiast who is using GNU/Linux and other Free Software tools at home and for educational purposes. My free time activities include but not limited to trying out different Linux distros.
